headline: Does CrowdStrike’s (CRWD) Gartner Visionary Status for AI SIEM Strengthen Its Competitive Edge?
summary: CrowdStrike was recently recognized as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) due to its AI-powered Falcon Next-Gen SIEM platform, enhanced by the integration of Onum’s real-time streaming technology for optimal detection and response. This recognition underscores industry momentum toward AI-driven cybersecurity solutions, positioning CrowdStrike as a key provider as organizations upgrade legacy systems to address escalating...
